body_html: I was able to build the tensorflow_cc.so using cc_library in the main build file, and providing the path to the src and header files. But, my custom op also has .cu source files, if I add them to hdrs=[], it throws me an error and gives me the type of accepted file types. How do i make sure my .so is created with the cuda files ?

body: I was able to build the tensorflow_cc.so using cc_library in the main build file, and providing the path to the src and header files. But, my custom op also has .cu source files, if I add them to hdrs=[], it throws me an error and gives me the type of accepted file types. How do i make sure my .so is created with the cuda files ?
